## getFeatureText() function

Determine the text string of the map feature. It implements the special handling required to determine the text content of a feature from its tags, which are passed in as the `env`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getFeatureText(context: Env | AttrEvaluationContext, technique: Technique, languages?: string[]): string | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  context | [Env](./harp-datasource-protocol.env.md) \| AttrEvaluationContext |  |
|  technique | [Technique](./harp-datasource-protocol.technique.md) | technique defining how text should be created from feature |
|  languages | string\[\] | List of languages to use, for example: Specify "en" to use the tag "name\_en" as the text of the string. Order reflects priority. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string \| undefined
